title: Without consent
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Women - Crimes against
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Male rape
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Male rape
description: Attempts to gain an understanding of sexually related violence in Australia. "Every woman's fear. Part 1": Examines the impact of a rape which occurred in Broadford Victoria in March 1991. The effects of sexual assault on victims, their families and the community are shown through poignant interviews with victims, police and counsellors. "The Dark Side. Part 2": Provides an insight into the mind of the rapist with offenders describing their motivations, emotions and their view of the victim. Contains a powerful interview with a victim of male sexual assault.
